mapper.select: SELECT MENU_CD, MENU_NM, CATE_CD, DEPTH, DVS_CD, SECT_CD, CATE_SORT, DVS_SORT, SECT_SORT, LINK_URL, DEL_YN, MODR_ID, MOD_DT, REGR_ID, REG_DT, ICON, DISPL_YN, CASE DEPTH WHEN 1 THEN CATE_SORT WHEN 2 THEN DVS_SORT END as menuOrder FROM st_menu_mgmt WHERE true = true AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY menuOrder

SELECT MENU_CD, MENU_NM, DEPTH, CATE_CD, DVS_CD, SECT_CD, CATE_SORT, DVS_SORT, SECT_SORT, LINK_URL, DEL_YN, MODR_ID, MOD_DT, REGR_ID, REG_DT, ICON, DISPL_YN FROM st_menu_mgmt WHERE true = true AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND MENU_CD = #{menuCd}
SELECT IFNULL((MAX(CATE_CD) + 1), 1) AS maxCateCd FROM st_menu_mgmt WHERE DEPTH = 1
SELECT IFNULL((MAX(DVS_CD) + 1), 1) AS maxDvsCd FROM st_menu_mgmt WHERE DEPTH = 2
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO st_menu_mgmt (MENU_CD, MENU_NM, DEPTH, CATE_CD, DVS_CD, CATE_SORT, DVS_SORT, LINK_URL, DEL_YN, MODR_ID, MOD_DT, REGR_ID, REG_DT, ICON, DISPL_YN)
VALUES ( #{menuCd}, #{menuNm}, #{depth}, #{cateCd}, #{dvsCd}, #{cateSort}, #{dvsSort}, #{linkUrl}, #{delYn}, #{modrId}, #{modDt}, #{regrId}, #{regrDt}, #{icon}, #{displYn} )
